code_value: Questions 1~2  You want to have a birthday party at home. Ask your mother for some advice.</br>Questions 3~4  Your friend Alice has just come back from Australia as an exchange student. Ask her two questions about her experience in Australia.
Questions 1~2  You want to have a birthday party at home. Ask your mother for some advice.
Questions 3~4  Your friend Alice has just come back from Australia as an exchange student. Ask her two questions about her experience in Australia.
